content: Israel Invoked to Praise the Lord.
Sing to the  a new song,
And praise Him in the congregation of His godly ones (believers).
Let Israel rejoice in their Maker;
Let Zionâ€™s children rejoice in their King.
Let them praise His name with dancing;
Let them sing praises to Him with the tambourine and lyre.
For the  takes pleasure in His people;
He will beautify the humble with salvation.
